events.message: I received my order yesterday, but the smartphone screen is scratched and has a visible defect. I’m very disappointed.
The reported issue has been categorized as Product Defect based on the customer's description of a scratched smartphone screen.
A customer support agent has been assigned to handle the case involving the defective product.
Hello, I’m sorry to hear that your smartphone arrived with a scratched screen. I’m here to help you resolve this issue as quickly as possible.
Could you please provide photos of the scratched screen and the packaging damage, if any? This will help us process your claim effectively.
I have attached clear photos showing the scratched screen and the condition of the box upon arrival. Please advise on how to proceed.
Thank you for the photos. We can offer an exchange for a new unit at no additional cost or a full refund if you prefer. Please let us know your choice.
I would prefer an exchange for a new smartphone as soon as possible. Thank you for the prompt response.
We have processed your exchange request. A replacement smartphone will be shipped to your address within 3 business days along with a return label for the defective unit.
Just checking in to confirm you have received your replacement smartphone and that everything is working well. Please let us know if you need any further assistance.
I received the replacement today and the phone is in perfect condition. Thank you for your excellent support throughout this process.
We are closing the case now as your issue has been resolved satisfactorily. Feel free to reach out if you need anything else.
We have sent a short survey to gather feedback about your support experience. Your input helps us improve our service.
